data.title: Seminar Talk on The Technical Challenges and Opportunities in Banking Services after Demonetization
data.text: On 14th March 2017, seminar talk on The Technical Challenges and Opportunities in Banking Services after Demonetization will be delivered by Mr. Subramanian, Chief Information Officer & Head of Technology (South Asia), Citi Group.

data.title: Seminar Talk on Protecting Indian Cyber Space and its Critical Information Infrastructure from Hackers
